name: Free Online JSON Diff Visual Comparison Tool - ATools
description: Free online JSON diff visual comparison: Recursively compare object/array structures, tree-view display of additions/deletions/changes/type changes.
seoDescription: Free online JSON diff visual comparison tool that supports pasting two JSON files for recursive structured diff, compares object fields and array elements with tree visualization showing additions, deletions, changes, and type modifications. Supports hiding identical items and copying diff lists. Pure frontend local operation without data uploads, suitable for API response comparison, configuration change verification, and debugging.

ui.title: JSON Diff Visual Comparison Tool
ui.leftError: Error: Left side is not valid JSON.
ui.rightError: Error: Right side is not valid JSON.
ui.fixJsonFirst: Please fix JSON parsing errors on both sides first.
